headline: Warren Buffett Is Out of Step With Markets. Berkshire Hathaway Keeps Selling Stocks.
summary: Warren Buffett is out of step with the markets.  The  returned 25% in 2024 and is up another 4% this year, but  Berkshire Hathaway  refuses to join the party and continues to be a net seller of stocks.  CEO Buffett, who oversees Berkshire’s $300 billion equity portfolio, is unenthusiastic about equities with the S&P 500 hitting new highs.
